Alex vs. Mexico

programme.title: Chopped
Emu Emergency
programme.desc: In round one, the chefs figure out if anyone has a clue what to do with emu. The competitors find a savory cake in the entrÃ©e basket. A really weird soda and an ice cream machine battle make for an enthralling dessert round.

programme.title: Chopped
Snail Caviar Dreams
programme.desc: Four chefs focus on making outstanding dishes from a crazy mix of ingredients in the appetizer basket, including escargot pearls; a super-sized item in the entrÃ©e basket provides a needed crunch, and a creepy dessert ingredient is a scary sight.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.desc: Competitors race to turn mystery ingredients into extraordinary three-course meals.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.desc: Four chefs arrive to celebrate the major impact that Julia Child made on the culinary world.

programme.title: Chopped
Julia Child's Kitchen: Part 3
programme.desc: Four chefs embrace their inner culinary idol to honor Julia Child's legacy and impress guest judge Isabella Rossellini.

programme.title: Chopped
Julia Child's Kitchen: Part 4
programme.desc: Four devotees of the cooking icon Julia Child endeavor to make her proud when they put a riff on her fish stew for an appetizer.Veal makes an appearance in the entrÃ©e basket, while fruit and processed cheese make for an oddball combo in dessert.

programme.title: Chopped
Julia Child's Kitchen: Finale
programme.desc: Four champions return to compete in the finale of a special tournament celebrating Julia Child's legacy. The competitor whose meal is the best will become the grand champion and win a $25,000 dream trip to follow in Julia's footsteps in France!

programme.title: Chopped
Seoul Searching
programme.desc: In the first round, four chefs with a deep love for Korean food get creative with a canned fish and a citrus compote; two popular Korean proteins are part of the puzzle in the entrÃ©e round.

programme.title: Wildcard Kitchen
Asian Night Market
programme.desc: Host Eric Adjepong challenges Asian American legends Jet Tila, Dale Talde, and Nini Nguyen in a raucous, irreverent, late-night culinary street fight where the winner could go home with $15,000 and bragging rights over their peers.

programme.title: Wildcard Kitchen
Clash of the Restaurant Queens
programme.desc: Chef Antonia Lofaso returns for another wild night at Eric Adjepong's high-stakes culinary poker showdown! This time, she's betting against her best buddies and acclaimed restaurateurs Ayesha Nurdjaja and Claudette Zepeda.

programme.title: Chopped
Dough the Right Thing
programme.desc: With no major tricks in the first basket, the chefs are left to create their own problems, as they attempt to piece together meat and potato appetizers; in the entrÃ©e round, duck dishes are a tall order in just 30 minutes.

programme.title: RateEscape: Stop Overpaying For Cellular
programme.desc: Cut up to HALF the cost of your monthly cell phone bill. Same Towers. Same Coverage. But a LOT less money. It sounds great but is it too good to be true? Join myth-busting legend Kari Byron as she takes on Big Wireless to save you money.

programme.title: Cindy Crawford talks about the latest breakthroughs in skincare

programme.title: House of Knives
Surprise Banishment

programme.desc: A new culinary powerhouse enters the arena, and the chefs create noodle dishes in the contender battle; in a highly anticipated matchup between two of the strongest chefs, the battle for the throne is fought over mushrooms.

programme.desc: In Logan, Utah, a family-run Indian spot hooked up to a gas station with Dad handing out specialties from his homeland; in Burlington, Vt., a dumpling house made from a legendary food cart where mother and daughter are serving authentic flavor.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Surf and Savory
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's grabbing a little surf, turf, and flavors from the Earth; in Puerto Rico, a local gem is serving off-the-hook pork trifongo and shrimp empanadas; Guy finds a mushroom po' boy in Somerville, N.J., and outrageous octopus in Cleveland.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
Aluminum, Aluminum and More Aluminum
programme.desc: The fabrication process begins; the team begins to see how difficult building a car out of aluminum by hand will be; each panel needs to be hand crafted to perfection and some of the lines in Dave's drawings look virtually impossible to replicate.

programme.title: Texas Metal
5500 Lifted, Texas Edition
programme.desc: This year's over-the-top build has Bill and crew lifting a 2020 Chevy Silverado 5500 more than a foot with a custom heavy-duty air suspension; the guys also prove their Texas mettle by radically overhauling the utility bed.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Earl Campbell's Custom Cadillac
programme.desc: Hall of Fame running back Earl Campbell arrives with the body and parts of a 1949 Cadillac, and the crew is honored to create a ground-up build for the local legend; a 1940 F-100 build snowballs into a much bigger job.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Earl Campbell's Custom Cadillac Part 2
programme.desc: NFL Hall-of-Famer Earl Campbell made a career mowing down defenders, so the guys take the same hell-bent approach to rebuilding his 1949 Cadillac; they also customize a van for a disabled motocross rider so he can drive again.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Earl Campbell's Custom Cadillac Part 3
programme.desc: The team revamps an old school '34 Buick into a modern day lowrider; after months of rebuilding the body and making a custom frame for Earl Campbell's '49 Cadillac, the Hall of Famer challenges the shop with a last-minute wrinkle.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Denali Drop
programme.desc: A client wants Bill to set the bar for custom SUVs with a 2018 Yukon Denali; the guys get busy with chassis, body mods, interior and twin turbos; Ekstensive goes full gangster with a 1948 Mercury, remaking a legendary car from the inside out.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Buckin' Bronco
programme.desc: Ekstensive's built a lot of trucks, but never a Ford Bronco until now; Bill and the guys transform a rusted '68 Bronco roadster into a high-powered off-roading truck with a supercharged engine, handmade dash, roll cage, and waterproof interior.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Beyond ZL1
programme.desc: The 2018 Camaro ZL1 is already a high performance sports car, but the owner wants Bill to improve his even more; the guys are happy to oblige, starting with a handmade aluminum chassis and interior; a new client wants his Sierra Denali frame dropped.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Beyond ZL1, Part 2
programme.desc: Bill and the gang are back under the hood of the 2018 Camaro ZL1, rebuilding the engine to add as much power as possible before a visit to the dynamometer; Ekstensive tries to turn a patinaed 1949 GMC pickup sleeper truck into keeper truck.

programme.title: Texas Metal
The Grand Finale
programme.desc: Bill and the team bring a wrecked '70 Suburban hauler back to life as a long bed, four door, crew cab dually with a 5.9 Cummins diesel engine, custom chassis and suspension; a '65 Plymouth Belvedere II gets some extra muscle with a Mopar crate Hemi.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Street Rod Milk Truck
programme.desc: Rusty and riddled with bullet holes, Bill's neighbor hands over the crumbling shell of a '52 Ford F4 Milk Truck; the guys unleash their best fabrication skills and turn this 60-year-old milk truck into a one of a kind, dazzling diesel street rod.

programme.title: Texas Metal
Beyond ZL1, Part 2
programme.desc: Bill and the gang are back under the hood of the 2018 Camaro ZL1, rebuilding the engine to add as much power as possible before a visit to the dynamometer; Ekstensive tries to turn a patinaed 1949 GMC pickup sleeper truck into keeper truck.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
Supercharged Nova and a 9/11 Tribute Truck
programme.desc: Arturo is a good friend of the shop, and his classic Nova will be a monster, with a rebuilt supercharged 6.2 LS, plus upgrades to the chassis and brakes; the crew revives a classic 1924 LaFrance fire truck for the nearby Cedar Hill Fire Department.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
One-of-a-Kind Widebody
programme.desc: Shorty's right-hand man in the body shop, Joe Gomez, has been in remission from cancer for nearly 10 years and wants to create a widebody Honda Accord for his wife to show his appreciation.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
1000+ hp Pro Street Nova!
programme.desc: Freiburger and Dulcich add 1,000+ hp to David's Pro Street 1969 Chevy Nova; in an attempt to make a true street/strip car, the guys fully build out this roller before taking it to the track to run some impressive times out of the gate.

programme.title: Roadkill
Blasphemi Takes on Hot Rod Drag Week!
programme.desc: Mike, Tony and the '55 Chevy race for glory in a brutal five-day test for drag-racing, street-driven cars; Blasphemi is know for three things, going fast, being awesome and breaking apart.

programme.title: Roadkill
1,700 Miles in the Vanishing Paint Challenger
programme.desc: The Vanishing Paint Challenger is back with an upgraded suspension and it's ready to dominate the autocross; David Freiburger and Steve Dulcich enter Tire Rack SCCA Solo Nationals in Lincoln, Neb., a mere 1,700 miles away.

programme.desc: When footage reveals a man's leg taking on a life of its own, it appears that something alien is trying to burst free; cutting-edge science investigates what explains this strange possession, and what it takes to exorcise the invader inside.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files
Aliens in the Amazon
programme.desc: After Neil Armstrong's moonwalk, he leads an expedition into the Amazon to find a legendary library that holds all knowledge of an advanced alien civilization; experts ask if a close encounter on the moon's surface inspired Armstrong's quest.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files
Did Aliens Nuke Mars?
programme.desc: A strange discovery by NASA's Mars Curiosity rover suggests the Red Planet was home to an alien nuclear war 300 million years ago; experts investigate if an extraterrestrial Armageddon transformed an Earth-like world into a wasteland.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files
Saturn's Moon Monsters
programme.desc: When NASA discovers something strange on Saturn's biggest moon, experts investigate if aliens feeding on the world's electric atmosphere could be the culprit; the disturbing evidence points to an apocalypse if these monsters ever make it to Earth.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
Voyager's Ultimate Mission
programme.desc: As the two Voyager spacecraft reach interstellar space, experts explore their astonishing discoveries and how their extended operation has transformed into the ultimate mission.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
The Moons of Saturn
programme.desc: With more than 80 moons, Saturn could rank among the most dynamic planetary system in Sol's neighborhood; with its giant underground oceans and protective magnetic fields, experts explore how Saturn's moons offer new insight into the Solar System.

programme.title: College Basketball
Texas at Alabama
programme.desc: Texas (9-6) visits No. 13 Alabama (11-4) at Coleman Coliseum for an SEC matchup. The Crimson Tide seek to rebound from a loss to Vanderbilt behind Labaron Philon Jr. (21.3 PPG). Texas aims to snap a two-game skid led by Dailyn Swain (15.6 PPG).

programme.desc: Texas State (6-8) visits the Cajundome to face a struggling Louisiana (1-14) squad. The Bobcats rely on standout Saniya Burks (15.2 PPG), while the Ragin' Cajuns look to freshman Amijah Price (13.6 PPG) to snap a three-game home slide.

Times Like These
programme.desc: Tension escalates between Frank and Mayor Chase after Frank makes a public arrest that goes viral; Danny and Baez investigate a gang attack that takes an unexpected turn; Jamie worries when Eddie lies to him about where she's going in the evenings.

programme.title: Blue Bloods

programme.title: Blue Bloods

programme.desc: Jamie faces backlash from fellow officers when he partners with Erin and Anthony to investigate an underground bar the NYPD and FDNY use to hide their criminal indiscretions; Eddie's partner considers leaving the force.

programme.title: Blue Bloods

programme.title: The Turning

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: Violent Night

programme.title: Retribution
